text: Te, kotoryye tvorili zlo, priderzhivayas' neveriya i sovershaya grekhi, dumali, chto My priravnyayem ikh k tem, kotoryye uverovali i sovershali blagochestivyye deyaniya, tak, chto My uravnyayem ikh v zhizni i v smerti. Kak skverno oni rassuzhdayut, yesli dumayut, chto oni podobny veruyushchim
